{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = Chaos serpent fireball | class = Demon1FX1 | game = Hexen }}[[Classes]]: Demon1FX1
The projectile fired by a [[Classes:Demon1|Green Chaos Serpent]]. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR Demon1FX1 { {{Property|Speed}} 15 {{Property|Radius}} 10 {{Property|Height}} 6 {{Property|Damage}} 5 {{Property|DamageType}} {{DamageType|Fire}} {{Property|Projectile}} +{{Flag|SPAWNSOUNDSOURCE}} {{Property|RenderStyle}} Add {{Property|SeeSound}} "DemonMissileFire" {{Property|DeathSound}} "DemonMissileExplode" States { Spawn: DMFX ABC 4 Bright Loop Death: DMFX DE 4 Bright DMFX FGH 3 Bright Stop } }
